This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS offset-rotate default is auto 
PASS offset-rotate auto expands to auto 0deg 
PASS offset-rotate reverse expands to auto 180deg 
PASS offset-rotate can be a fixed angle 
PASS offset-rotate angles are converted to degrees 
PASS offset-rotate can be supplied with angle before auto 
PASS offset-rotate can be supplied with angle before reverse 
PASS offset-rotate is unaffected by child elements 
PASS offset-rotate can be explicitly inherited 
PASS offset-rotate is not inherited by default 
PASS offset-rotate style can be set inline 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
